mapper.insert:

ID,
CREATED_DATE_TIME,

mapper.update:
update DIMISSION
CREATED_DATE_TIME = #{createdDateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATED_USER_ID = #{createdUserId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATED_USER_NAME = #{createdUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEPARTURE_TIME = #{departureTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
EMPLOYEE_ID = #{employeeId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LAST_UPDATE_DATE_TIME = #{lastUpdateDateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LAST_UPDATE_USER_ID = #{lastUpdateUserId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LAST_UPDATE_USER_NAME = #{lastUpdateUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REASON = #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATE = #{state,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update DIMISSION set CREATED_DATE_TIME = #{createdDateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATED_USER_ID = #{createdUserId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, CREATED_USER_NAME = #{createdUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEPARTURE_TIME = #{departureTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, EMPLOYEE_ID = #{employeeId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LAST_UPDATE_DATE_TIME = #{lastUpdateDateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LAST_UPDATE_USER_ID = #{lastUpdateUserId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LAST_UPDATE_USER_NAME = #{lastUpdateUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REASON = #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATE = #{state,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: SELECT d.reason, d.state, d.EMPLOYEE_ID, d.DEPARTURE_TIME, e.name as employeeName FROM DIMISSION d left join EMPLOYEES e on e.id=d.EMPLOYEE_ID where d.ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

SELECT d.reason, d.state, d.EMPLOYEE_ID, d.DEPARTURE_TIME, e.name as employeeName FROM DIMISSION d left join EMPLOYEES e on e.id=d.EMPLOYEE_ID where d.EMPLOYEE_ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and d.state=0
